document.full_text: a petition from family members of some of alleged serial killer anthony sowell's victims will ask prosecutors to accept a plea of life without parole, an attorney for family members said on tuesday.
document.title: victims' families want plea deal in anthony sowell case
lines_and_colors: a petition from family members of some of alleged serial killer anthony sowell's victims will ask prosecutors to accept a plea of life without parole, an attorney for family members said on tuesday.
